data.name: Dread Hunger Fine Rings
data.detailed_description:
If you haven't yet lost your fingers to frostbite, these rings are for you!

The Fine Rings collection offers an elegant selection of three stylish options to distinguish yourself with.

Pack includes:

  • Cameo Ring
  • Signet Ring
  • Ruby Ring

You can equip these cosmetics to all characters in-game.
data.about_the_game:

data.short_description: If you haven't yet lost your fingers to frostbite, these rings are for you! The Fine Rings collection offers an elegant selection of three stylish options to distinguish yourself with.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Turkish
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 760 GTX or AMD Radeon R9 280
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Microphone required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4770K or AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 1060-6GB or AMD RX 580
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Microphone required

data.legal_notice: Dread Hunger™ © 2021 by Slowdrive Studios™. All rights reserved.

content_descriptors.notes: You can chop the limbs off animals and people with a sword.   You can pick up severed heads / limbs and run around with them and then use them to kill other people.  Sometimes dead people have willies.
